'''Radiant Spincrystal 138''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock a [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Whirl of Chalchiuhtlicue]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on the upper level on one of the chains holding the platform up in the [["Scions of the Canopy"]] subarea.
